What is Instagive.io?

We help charities and non-profits grow their bottom line on-site or on-the-go.

By offering mobile & online giving venues, we're streamlining their current payment system and attracting new givers.

With just 3 taps of their phone, donors can give a one-time or recurring gift. Why wait? Start accepting online donations today!
